fulltext:
INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY 
Engineer 
As an Information Technology engineer 
looking for Tester, QA, QC with the desire 
to work in a flexible and dynamic 
environment to develop your career and 
apply your skills and knowledge to 
yourself. I believe I can become a 
prominent candidate. 
Information Technology  
Degree of engineer  
       The product is a 2D game called Gold Miner built using C# 
language and Unity 2D tool. The game consists of four levels from 
easy to difficult, graphical interface fun, friendly, effects and sound 
fun, enticing players. 
       This game built on PC with 4 screens play from easy to difficult 
with different objectives in each level and functions achieve as load 
scene by button, create effects for buttons, display the interface as 
you like, count down the time spent in each stage, add points when 
eating gold, create sound for the game. 
       With funny images and sounds, the Game creates a space for 
players to search and conquer every treasure of different sizes with 
different scores. The player pulls more and more objects high value 
treasure the higher the score. 
•
Used to work with GitHub for storage. 
•
Language programming: C#.   
•
Tools: Unity, Visual Studio, Photoshop CS6, Illustrator. 
INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY 
Engineer 
• 
      Building sales website help to provide more informations to 
customers and convenient for shopping. Users can add, edit, delete 
and update products. Customers allowed to view, seach, add shopping 
carts and choose to buy products they want to buy. 
• 
Design UI with photoshop. 
• 
Cutting html and css from psd. 
• 
Knowledge of web programming. 
Language programming: HTML, CSS, PHP, MySQL.
       Experience for editing photos, images and logo with basic 
knowledge for Photoshop, Illustrator and Proshow software.
• 
Making and designing Power Point for presentation.  
Setup and install Linux and Windows operation system.
Knowledge for Word and Excel.

educations.major_categories: Máy tính và công nghệ thông tin

experiences.detail:
The product is a 2D game called Gold Miner built using C# language and Unity 2D tool. The game consists of four levels from easy to difficult, graphical interface fun, friendly, effects and sound fun, enticing players.
This game built on PC with 4 screens play from easy to difficult with different objectives in each level and functions achieve as load scene by button, create effects for buttons, display the interface as you like, count down the time spent in each stage, add points when eating gold, create sound for the game.
With funny images and sounds, the Game creates a space for players to search and conquer every treasure of different sizes with different scores. The player pulls more and more objects high value treasure the higher the score.
Used to work with GitHub for storage.
Language programming: C#. Tools: Unity, Visual Studio, Photoshop CS6, Illustrator.

Building sales website help to provide more informations to customers and convenient for shopping. Users can add, edit, delete and update products. Customers allowed to view, seach, add shopping carts and choose to buy products they want to buy.
Design UI with photoshop.
Cutting html and css from psd.
Knowledge of web programming.
Language programming: HTML, CSS, PHP, MySQL. Making video and designing graphics
Experience for editing photos, images and logo with basic knowledge for Photoshop, Illustrator and Proshow software.
Office Skills Making and designing Power Point for presentation.
Setup and install Linux and Windows operation system.
Knowledge for Word and Excel.
